Summary: A bright light that traveled about 2500 ft off the ground in Holiday Fl. Very cool!
divs: Sighting DetailsMy family and I watched a bright orange redish light travel out of the east to the south east for about 2 miles and went in the clouds only to return in the direction to the north west. Lights stoped and hover for about 2 min. when a plane came out of the north the light slowly dimmed out. lost sight!
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Holiday
There were 4 other sightings in Holiday on or around July 4th 2013
